title: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: When running the control example and resizing the window vertically, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash. This behavior is unexpected and seems excessive.
OB: When resizing the window vertically in the control example, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
EB: When resizing the window vertically in the control example, only the bottom edge of the outermost frames should be repainted. There should be no flashing of the tabs in the TabFolder or other frames.
SR:
1. Run the control example.
2. Resize the window in the vertical direction only.
3. Observe that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash during the resizing.
